description: Lance Stephenson signed a 10-day contract with the Indiana Pacers last week. The Pacers are the 13th seed in the Eastern Conference. They are the only two teams with a better record than the Detroit Pistons and the Orlando Magic. He is averaging 14.2 points, 3.2 rebounds and 6.0 assists per game in his first game back in the NBA.
topicText:
Comedian Bob Saget, star of Full House and narrator of How I Met ...
Comedian Bob Saget, who shot to fame in sitcom Full House before cementing his place on American TVs with Funniest Home Videos, dies aged 65.
Actor and comedian Bob Saget dies at 65
Saget was a prominent presence on American television screens throughout the 1990s as the father Danny Tanner on Full House and the host of America'sÂ ...
'One of the best': tributes flow for actor and comedian Bob Saget
The 65-year-old was best known for his role as beloved single dad Danny Tanner on the sitcom Full House.
Comic Bob Saget found dead in hotel room
Bob Saget, an actor and comedian best known as the jovial dad on the television sitcom Full House, has been found dead in a hotel room in Orlando, Florida.
Full House star Bob Saget found dead in hotel room
Actor Bob Saget, 65, best known as the jovial dad on the television sitcom Full House, has been found dead in Florida hotel room.
